newsitem.title: GERMANY: German Holzmann completes apartment sale.
newsitem.headline: German Holzmann completes apartment sale.

text.p: German construction group Holzmann AG said on Tuesday it had now completed the sale of some 4,000 apartments, part of a property portfolio on which the group was in 1995 forced to make huge write-downs.
Holzmann said the sale, for which it gave no price, "strengthened the financial situation and capital structure of the group".
The company, which is undergoing a deep restructuring of its business, said that the proceeds would counterbalance the majority of charges due in the 1996 book-year.
Holzmann said earlier this month it had found an unnamed buyer for the apartments, most of which were built in the 1950s and 1960s.
The group made losses of 443 million marks in 1995 following huge write-downs for losses on real estate projects.
